title: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately makes changes.
OB: When I create a working set with one project and select it, the package view is filtered.
EB: At the moment of deletion, the package view in the background is refiltered. In my opinion, the refiltering should only happen when closing the working set selection dialog, not while manipulating it. Additionally, I believe that pressing cancel should cancel all changes made to working sets, including canceling the remove operation.
